h2. APIs Documentation

{{div3: class=support | ng-app=myApp | ng-controller=SupportController}}
{{html:
	<link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Droid+Sans:400,700' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>
    <link href='/lib/swagger/css/hightlight.default.css' media='screen' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>
    <link href='/lib/swagger/css/screen.css' media='screen' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/jquery-1.8.0.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/jquery.slideto.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/jquery.wiggle.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/jquery.ba-bbq.min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/handlebars-1.0.rc.1.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/underscore-min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/backbone-min.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/swagger.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/swagger-ui.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
    <script src='/lib/swagger/lib/highlight.7.3.pack.js' type='text/javascript'></script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
	$(function () {
	    window.swaggerUi = new SwaggerUi({
                discoveryUrl:"/wiki_gcb/.files/docsample/data/catalog",
                apiKey:"special-key",
                dom_id:"swagger-ui-container",
                supportHeaderParams: false,
                supportedSubmitMethods: ['get', 'post', 'put'],
                onComplete: function(swaggerApi, swaggerUi){
                	if(console) {
                        console.log("Loaded SwaggerUI")
                        console.log(swaggerApi);
                        console.log(swaggerUi);
                    }
                  $('pre code').each(function(i, e) {hljs.highlightBlock(e)});
                },
                onFailure: function(data) {
                	if(console) {
                        console.log("Unable to Load SwaggerUI");
                        console.log(data);
                    }
                },
                docExpansion: "none"
            });

            window.swaggerUi.load();
        });

    </script>
	<div id="message-bar" class="swagger-ui-wrap">
	    &nbsp;
	</div>

	<div id="swagger-ui-container" class="swagger-ui-wrap">
	</div>
}}
{{div3}}
